snippet: Elliott has become the youngest champion in Nascar history by wrapping up the Nationwide Series title at Phoenix International Raceway.
abstract: Chase Elliott, at age 18, becomes youngest driver to win a title in any of Nascar's three national series by wrapping up Nationwide Series title at Phoenix International Raceway; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Elliott has become the youngest champion in Nascar history by wrapping up the Nationwide Series title at Phoenix International Raceway.

headline.main: At 18, Chase Elliott Is Nascar’s Youngest Champion

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
